request.description: Gets basic account details of the current user. It excludes the password.
Allow the user to change his e-mail address and password.
Allows the user to delete his own account. All references in the database will be deleted, including: favorites, archives, and playlists.

exec: pm.test("Should NOT have a password field", function () {

request.description: Allows the current user to set a default voice per language. If none are given, the "isLanguageDefault" will determine the default voice to use per language.

We generate the audio of an article on-demand. Because this is what costs the most. If a user just adds an article, but never listens to it, we don't have wasted costs to generate an audiofile of it.

What this endpoint does: If it needs to generate an audiofile > crawls the article URL to extract all the content, generate a readable format of the article and use that to create a voice recording. All this data is saved in the database and returned to the user.

So this endpoint could take a little longer to load when it still needs to generate an audiofile.
Creates a basic article in the database. This article does not include an audiofile, yet. Audiofiles are generated on demand.

response.name: Create a article
response.body:
{
	"title": "One Behavior Separates The Successful From The Average",
	"description": "A certain farmer had become old and ready to pass his farm down to one of his two sons. When he brought his sons together to speak about it, he told them: The farm will go to the younger son.",
	"language": "en",
	"sourceName": "Medium",
	"url": "https://medium.com/thrive-global/one-behavior-separates-the-successful-from-the-average-adc8e6edd3e3"
}

request.description: Create another audiofile for this article using a different voice then the default one.
Completely deletes an article from the database, including all the referencies for the users (archives, playlists, favorites) and audiofiles. Normal users should not have access to this endpoint.

item.name: Sync article data with article at source

request.description: Allows a new user to create an account.
An endpoint to delete a user on request. The endpoint should only be available to a certain user ID.

item.name: Add article to playlist by url

request.description: Change the order of the playlist by sending the article ID that changed in order. The endpoint will correctly order the other articles in the playlist. It returns the new ordered playlist.
To set an playlist item as favorite just run the patch URL. To remove a playlist item from the favorites, just run the patch URL with "favoritedAt": null

item.name: Delete voice preview by ID (admin only)
